title: Deawanakereba Yokatta no
original_name: 出会わなければよかったの
sinopse:
Beautiful, closed and friendless; a student who, even during classes is left behind: Yuzuru. And was that Yuzuru, with which Kotarou reunited; that childhood friend with whom he used to play.

Included one-shot:
Tonari wa Nani wo Susu Hito zo
